website_summaries.verdict: This bidet, designed specifically for round-shaped toilets, can be tailored to all body types and needs thanks to its special technology and temperature adjustments.
pros: This is a very accessible bidet that offers child-friendly controls, Braille information, and generally a lot of user-friendly controls to totally customize the experience
There's an eco setting to reduce the unit's consumption, and the heated seat offers three temperature options
cons: You'll need to make sure you have a power outlet nearby
Some users found that the drying cycle isn't as effective as using toilet paper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bidet
customer_reviews.text: With the great toilet paper shortage of 2020 I decided to splurge and upgrade my bidet to this electric bidet. Such a fantastic upgrade. I didn't think living in Arizona I would care about the heated seat or water but its fantastic. I removed the old seat and installed this in less than 15 minutes. If you are considering a bidet this one wont disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Geopeach209

customer_reviews.title: Great product if they send you the correct one.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is outstanding, it works really well and has a lot of cool features. It is a 5 star product. So why only 2 stars? Well when ordering you need to make sure that you get the correct one for your toilet, round or elongated, I have a round toilet. I made sure to pick round. What came in the post? Elongated. It is frustrating. I processed the return but am waiting what seems forever for the replacement. I will update the review when I get the correct one.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: easy to install functions work well slightly bigger on the front for round shape but works well without any issues
customer_reviews.author: Tgs

customer_reviews.title: Good features for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and features are great for the price. First bidet that I have used and never going back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Careful. You might not get what you ordered. 4 stars.
customer_reviews.text: I work the nozzle could adjust its position More. I end up shifting myself to accommodate. Seat heating is good. Air dry feels cold at first and takes a while. The water pressure could be a little higher too. I ordered the elongated version and it seemed like the only option at the time but I received a round version.
customer_reviews.author: k, palacio

customer_reviews.title: Impressed so far
customer_reviews.text: We've had the bidet for a couple of weeks and are pleased with it's varied options and the quality. Adjustable temperature of both water and the seat, adjustable spray position (forward/back and also a side-to-side motion). Great features! It was very easy to install once we had a GFCI outlet added near the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: E Sabul

customer_reviews.title: I would buy if you are a lid fighter
customer_reviews.text: Bidet itself is good. Had to ask my super to install but worked out... however the lid won’t stay open.... i have to fight with the toilet cover off my back every time I go to bathroom. If you have constipation, don’t get it bc you will lose ur poop while fighting with that lid off ur back
customer_reviews.author: Yeonibabe

customer_reviews.title: installation requirement not mentioend clearly.
customer_reviews.text: the installation requirement should show the distance/free space requirements for bolting to the toilet. it only shows what type of toilet it fits in the amazon ad. it needs more free space from the bolt of the toilet cover to the water reservoir. but it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: JayKay

customer_reviews.title: Toilet paper usage is minimal now.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, installation was simple ,the product works awesome. Why wouldn't everyone want one?
customer_reviews.author: robert g goodin

customer_reviews.title: Hollow seat
customer_reviews.text: We got this with the whole Covid toilet paper issues and love it however after a couple months the seat has cracked underneath, the seat is hollow not solid and this was disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saves TP!
customer_reviews.text: A little small for my.... well fat butt, but it works great. You can adjust the strength, position, and temperature of the spray.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Sent Wrong Fitting
customer_reviews.text: Ordered elongated fit and I got round fit. The round fit is 1.3 inches shorter than the elongated version.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. Life altering.
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful. Significant reduction in TP use. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: T N merciez

customer_reviews.title: Will never go back to a regular seat again!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! It's easy to install, my husband did it quickly and easily. It fit perfectly on our elongated toilet seat. The wash feature is so nice it cleans so good and makes you feel fresh. There is a built in button panel in case you misplace the remote. I love the heated seat, and the nozzles stay clean unlike one of my other seats I had- this keeps the nozzles nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie amzshpr

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to replace my old seats (2) with two new ones. The description said they would not slip but guess what? They do! I thought they were installed incorrectly and had them removed and then reinstalled. The plastic nuts break and even metal ones won't keep the seat from shifting. I even tried calling the company to get replacement parts but was put on hold for ever. Had them for too long to return so now I'm ordering new ones from a different manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Mariyn

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to install and set up. Instructions are simple use is simple. Especially the cleaning and seat heater are my two favorite. Overall this is simple and nice 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Mason

product_meta.title: Coway Bidetmega 200R Elongated-Electronic Bidet Seat, White
product_meta.description: Size:Elongated| Color:WhiteCoway Bidet mega 200’s sleek design, smart engineering and hygienic construction makes it ideal for modern bathrooms. Featuring the Coway i-wave system, water ionization and a heated seat feature, the unit is easy to install, and the twin nozzles are designed to be easy to clean. The Coway Bidet mega 200 also features controls, including Braille for the visually impaired. The unit mounts directly onto your existing toilet bowl and is powered using a standard outlet, with an eco (green plug) mode function to reduce energy use.
feature_bullets: Coway Bidet mega 200’s unique i-wave technology is designed to fit every body for a comfortable cleaning experience.
The two-stage cleansing process keeps the water flow channel and dual stainless-steel nozzle hygienic at all times.
Users can customize the water temperature, water pressure, direction and flow, and the built-in dryer gives post-cleansing comfort.
The sensor seat are heated and the 3 level temperature can be adjusted to your preference.
The special eco mode helps to reduce the total energy consumption of the unit
IPX5 rated bidetmega 200 can resist a sustained, low-pressure water jet spray
Easy Installation — Simply connect the Coway Bidet mega 200 to the regular toilet bowl with common household tools.

Bidet mega 200 requires electricity, please make sure that there is a power outlet nearby. Power cord is 47. 2 inches. And make sure that the bidet fits your toilet. Please see guide for more details.
The user- buttons, including child- controls and braille for the visually impaired.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars47 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
